products.name: Design Pera Bar Ellipse
products.description: Pera product family reflects a modern and minimal design approach. Pera product family includes large range of different base and seat options. Pera is Architonic ID: 20327665Year of Launch: 2003Pera product family reflects a modern and minimal design approach.Pera product family includes large range of different base and seat options. Pera is one of B&T Design’s early designs and one of the most popular ones. Even though Pera seats simply formed, scoop shape of the seat provides very comfortable seating. Lean foot options and the instantly recognizable form of the Pera Chairs and Pera Stools, make it possible to become a common seat of different places. Mid-Century inspired form and easy going design of the Pera Series made it one of the best sellers for B&T Design for many years. This chair and stool range is also injection molded polyurethane foam and steel structure.With its all-base options perfectly fine for any commercial project. B&T Design’s all graded in materials and colors approved for this chair. Metal bases can be polished or matte chrome. They can also be ordered painted in certain colors. Sled base is solid steel. Ellipse base comes swivel by standard. Wood bases made of solid beech and can be finished in B&T Design’s standard wood stains. Height adjustable barstool base also available in many color and finish options. It is very easy to assemble and disassemble. Thanks to ease of assembling, this chair shipped to most projects not-assembled to save customers

products.name: Design Metric
products.description: Metric stands out with the dynamic silhouette of its vertical carriers at different heights and the vibrant rhythm it adds to the space. Deriving its Architonic ID: 20325541Year of Launch: 2025Metric stands out with the dynamic silhouette of its vertical carriers at different heights and the vibrant rhythm it adds to the space. Deriving its uniqueness from the geometry created by the play of color and form, Metric determines the character of the space it occupies as an innovative seating product. The high and low backrest surfaces are treated as both a carrier and an element that creates the rhythm of the extraordinary aesthetics of the design. Fixed back cushions are part of the design and maximize comfort. Its structure, open to modulation options, allows for customization and space-specific placement. products.name: Design Pera Bar Ellipse
products.description: Pera product family reflects a modern and minimal design approach. Pera product family includes large range of different base and seat options. Pera is Architonic ID: 20327665Year of Launch: 2003Pera product family reflects a modern and minimal design approach.Pera product family includes large range of different base and seat options. Pera is one of B&T Design’s early designs and one of the most popular ones. Even though Pera seats simply formed, scoop shape of the seat provides very comfortable seating. Lean foot options and the instantly recognizable form of the Pera Chairs and Pera Stools, make it possible to become a common seat of different places. Mid-Century inspired form and easy going design of the Pera Series made it one of the best sellers for B&T Design for many years. This chair and stool range is also injection molded polyurethane foam and steel structure.With its all-base options perfectly fine for any commercial project. B&T Design’s all graded in materials and colors approved for this chair. Metal bases can be polished or matte chrome. They can also be ordered painted in certain colors. Sled base is solid steel. Ellipse base comes swivel by standard. Wood bases made of solid beech and can be finished in B&T Design’s standard wood stains. Height adjustable barstool base also available in many color and finish options. It is very easy to assemble and disassemble. Thanks to ease of assembling, this chair shipped to most projects not-assembled to save customers

The high back alternative, one of the impressive details of the Noda sofas designed as single and two-seat, creates the feeling of a retreat thanks to the privacy that it allows in the shared space, and provides comfort of private use with its sound insulation.While all the colour options in the B&T colour chart can be applied to its upholstery and powder coated, electrostatic metal legs, Noda brings its authentic character and contributes to spaces such as waiting rooms, shared workspaces and offices with an innovative and ambitious design approach. Architonic ID: 20276908Year
